title: WB Status Web Component
description: Schema for wb-status custom element attributes

max-events.description: Maximum number of events to show simultaneously

event-duration.description: Duration to show events in milliseconds

fade-delay.description: Delay before starting fade out animation

show-duplicates.description: Whether to show duplicate consecutive events

title.description: Title text for the status bar

settings.description: JSON string containing settings to display

visible.description: Whether the status bar is visible

id.description: Unique identifier for the status bar

name.description: Name attribute for the status bar

onevent-added.description: JavaScript code to execute when an event is added

onevent-shown.description: JavaScript code to execute when an event is shown

onevent-hidden.description: JavaScript code to execute when an event is hidden

onsetting-updated.description: JavaScript code to execute when a setting is updated

onwb-status:event-added.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-status:event-added event

onwb-status:event-shown.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-status:event-shown event

onwb-status:event-hidden.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-status:event-hidden event

onwb-status:setting-updated.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-status:setting-updated event

onwb-status:ready.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-status:ready event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this status bar

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this status bar

aria-live.description: How screen readers announce status changes

role.description: ARIA role for the status bar
